00081 static int space_clip_frame_poll(bContext *C)
00082 {
00083     SpaceClip *sc = CTX_wm_space_clip(C);
00084 
00085     if (sc) {
00086         MovieClip *clip = ED_space_clip(sc);
00087 
00088         if (clip)
00089             return BKE_movieclip_has_frame(clip, &sc->user);
00090     }
00091 
00092     return FALSE;
00093 }

00095 /********************** add marker operator *********************/
00096 
00097 static void add_marker(SpaceClip *sc, float x, float y)
00098 {
00099     MovieClip *clip = ED_space_clip(sc);
00100     MovieTracking *tracking = &clip->tracking;
00101     ListBase *tracksbase = BKE_tracking_get_tracks(tracking);
00102     MovieTrackingTrack *track;
00103     int width, height;
00104 
00105     ED_space_clip_size(sc, &width, &height);
00106 
00107     track = BKE_tracking_add_track(tracking, tracksbase, x, y, sc->user.framenr, width, height);
00108 
00109     BKE_tracking_select_track(tracksbase, track, TRACK_AREA_ALL, 0);
00110 
00111     clip->tracking.act_track = track;
00112 }
00113 
00114 static int add_marker_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00115 {
00116     SpaceClip *sc = CTX_wm_space_clip(C);
00117     MovieClip *clip = ED_space_clip(sc);
00118     float pos[2];
00119     int width, height;
00120 
00121     ED_space_clip_size(sc, &width, &height);
00122     if (!width || !height)
00123         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00124 
00125     RNA_float_get_array(op->ptr, "location", pos);
00126 
00127     add_marker(sc, pos[0], pos[1]);
00128 
00129     /* reset offset from locked position, so frame jumping wouldn't be so confusing */
00130     sc->xlockof = 0;
00131     sc->ylockof = 0;
00132 
00133     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_MOVIECLIP|NA_EDITED, clip);
00134 
00135     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00136 }
00137 
00138 static int add_marker_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
00139 {
00140     float co[2];
00141 
00142     ED_clip_mouse_pos(C, event, co);
00143 
00144     RNA_float_set_array(op->ptr, "location", co);
00145 
00146     return add_marker_exec(C, op);
00147 }

00149 void CLIP_OT_add_marker(wmOperatorType *ot)
00150 {
00151     /* identifiers */
00152     ot->name = "Add Marker";
00153     ot->idname = "CLIP_OT_add_marker";
00154     ot->description = "Place new marker at specified location";
00155 
00156     /* api callbacks */
00157     ot->invoke = add_marker_invoke;
00158     ot->exec = add_marker_exec;
00159     ot->poll = space_clip_frame_poll;
00160 
00161     /* flags */
00162     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00163 
00164     /* properties */
00165     RNA_def_float_vector(ot->srna, "location", 2, NULL, -FLT_MIN, FLT_MAX,
00166         "Location", "Location of marker on frame", -1.0f, 1.0f);
00167 }

00169 /********************** delete track operator *********************/
00170 
00171 static int delete_track_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00172 {
00173     SpaceClip *sc = CTX_wm_space_clip(C);
00174     MovieClip *clip = ED_space_clip(sc);
00175     MovieTracking *tracking = &clip->tracking;
00176     ListBase *tracksbase = BKE_tracking_get_tracks(tracking);
00177     MovieTrackingTrack *track = tracksbase->first, *next;
00178 
00179     while (track) {
00180         next = track->next;
00181 
00182         if (TRACK_VIEW_SELECTED(sc, track))
00183             clip_delete_track(C, clip, tracksbase, track);
00184 
00185         track = next;
00186     }
00187 
00188     /* nothing selected now, unlock view so it can be scrolled nice again */
00189     sc->flag &= ~SC_LOCK_SELECTION;
00190 
00191     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00192 }
00193 
00194 void CLIP_OT_delete_track(wmOperatorType *ot)
00195 {
00196     /* identifiers */
00197     ot->name = "Delete Track";
00198     ot->idname = "CLIP_OT_delete_track";
00199     ot->description = "Delete selected tracks";
00200 
00201     /* api callbacks */
00202     ot->invoke = WM_operator_confirm;
00203     ot->exec = delete_track_exec;
00204     ot->poll = ED_space_clip_poll;
00205 
00206     /* flags */
00207     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00208 }

00210 /********************** delete marker operator *********************/
00211 
00212 static int delete_marker_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00213 {
00214     SpaceClip *sc = CTX_wm_space_clip(C);
00215     MovieClip *clip = ED_space_clip(sc);
00216     ListBase *tracksbase = BKE_tracking_get_tracks(&clip->tracking);
00217     MovieTrackingTrack *track = tracksbase->first, *next;
00218     int framenr = sc->user.framenr;
00219     int has_selection = 0;
00220 
00221     while (track) {
00222         next = track->next;
00223 
00224         if (TRACK_VIEW_SELECTED(sc, track)) {
00225             MovieTrackingMarker *marker = BKE_tracking_exact_marker(track, framenr);
00226 
00227             if (marker) {
00228                 has_selection |= track->markersnr>1;
00229 
00230                 clip_delete_marker(C, clip, tracksbase, track, marker);
00231             }
00232         }
00233 
00234         track = next;
00235     }
00236 
00237     if (!has_selection) {
00238         /* nothing selected now, unlock view so it can be scrolled nice again */
00239         sc->flag &= ~SC_LOCK_SELECTION;
00240     }
00241 
00242     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00243 }

00246 {
00247     /* identifiers */
00248     ot->name = "Delete Marker";
00249     ot->idname = "CLIP_OT_delete_marker";
00250     ot->description = "Delete marker for current frame from selected tracks";
00251 
00252     /* api callbacks */
00253     ot->invoke = WM_operator_confirm;
00254     ot->exec = delete_marker_exec;
00255     ot->poll = ED_space_clip_poll;
00256 
00257     /* flags */
00258     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00259 }

00261 /********************** slide marker operator *********************/
00262 
00263 #define SLIDE_ACTION_POS    0
00264 #define SLIDE_ACTION_SIZE   1
00265 #define SLIDE_ACTION_OFFSET 2
00266 
00267 typedef struct {
00268     int area, action;
00269     MovieTrackingTrack *track;
00270     MovieTrackingMarker *marker;
00271 
00272     int mval[2];
00273     int width, height;
00274     float *min, *max, *pos, *offset;
00275     float smin[2], smax[2], spos[2], soff[2];
00276     float (*smarkers)[2];
00277 
00278     int lock, accurate;
00279 } SlideMarkerData;
00280 
00281 static SlideMarkerData *create_slide_marker_data(SpaceClip *sc, MovieTrackingTrack *track,
00282             MovieTrackingMarker *marker, wmEvent *event, int area, int action, int width, int height)
00283 {
00284     SlideMarkerData *data = MEM_callocN(sizeof(SlideMarkerData), "slide marker data");
00285 
00286     marker = BKE_tracking_ensure_marker(track, sc->user.framenr);
00287 
00288     data->area = area;
00289     data->action = action;
00290     data->track = track;
00291     data->marker = marker;
00292 
00293     if (area == TRACK_AREA_POINT) {
00294         data->pos = marker->pos;
00295         data->offset = track->offset;
00296         copy_v2_v2(data->spos, marker->pos);
00297         copy_v2_v2(data->soff, track->offset);
00298     }
00299     else if (area == TRACK_AREA_PAT) {
00300         if (action == SLIDE_ACTION_SIZE) {
00301             data->min = track->pat_min;
00302             data->max = track->pat_max;
00303         }
00304         else {
00305             int a;
00306 
00307             data->pos = marker->pos;
00308             data->offset = track->offset;
00309 
00310             copy_v2_v2(data->soff, track->offset);
00311 
00312             data->smarkers = MEM_callocN(sizeof(*data->smarkers)*track->markersnr, "slide marekrs");
00313             for (a = 0; a < track->markersnr; a++)
00314                 copy_v2_v2(data->smarkers[a], track->markers[a].pos);
00315         }
00316     }
00317     else if (area == TRACK_AREA_SEARCH) {
00318         data->min = track->search_min;
00319         data->max = track->search_max;
00320     }
00321 
00322     if (area == TRACK_AREA_SEARCH || (area == TRACK_AREA_PAT && action != SLIDE_ACTION_OFFSET)) {
00323         copy_v2_v2(data->smin, data->min);
00324         copy_v2_v2(data->smax, data->max);
00325     }
00326 
00327     data->mval[0] = event->mval[0];
00328     data->mval[1] = event->mval[1];
00329 
00330     data->width = width;
00331     data->height = height;
00332 
00333     if (action == SLIDE_ACTION_SIZE)
00334         data->lock = 1;
00335 
00336     return data;
00337 }
00338 
00339 /* corner = 0: right-bottom corner,
00340  * corner = 1: left-top corner */
00341 static int mouse_on_corner(SpaceClip *sc, MovieTrackingTrack *track, MovieTrackingMarker *marker,
00342                            int area, float co[2], int corner, int width, int height)
00343 {
00344     int inside = 0;
00345     float size = 12.0f;
00346     float min[2], max[2];
00347     float crn[2], dx, dy, tdx, tdy;
00348 
00349     if (area == TRACK_AREA_SEARCH) {
00350         copy_v2_v2(min, track->search_min);
00351         copy_v2_v2(max, track->search_max);
00352     }
00353     else {
00354         copy_v2_v2(min, track->pat_min);
00355         copy_v2_v2(max, track->pat_max);
00356     }
00357 
00358     dx = size / width / sc->zoom;
00359     dy = size / height / sc->zoom;
00360 
00361     tdx = 5.0f / width / sc->zoom;
00362     tdy = 5.0f / height / sc->zoom;
00363 
00364     dx = MIN2(dx, (max[0] - min[0]) / 6.0f) + tdx;
00365     dy = MIN2(dy, (max[1] - min[1]) / 6.0f) + tdy;
00366 
00367     if (corner == 0) {
00368         crn[0] = marker->pos[0] + max[0];
00369         crn[1] = marker->pos[1] + min[1];
00370 
00371         inside = co[0] >= crn[0] - dx && co[0] <= crn[0] + tdx && co[1] >= crn[1] - tdy && co[1] <= crn[1] + dy;
00372     }
00373     else {
00374         crn[0] = marker->pos[0]+min[0];
00375         crn[1] = marker->pos[1]+max[1];
00376 
00377         inside = co[0] >= crn[0] - dx && co[0] <= crn[0] + dx && co[1] >= crn[1] - dy && co[1] <= crn[1] + dy;
00378     }
00379 
00380     return inside;
00381 }
00382 
00383 static int mouse_on_offset(SpaceClip *sc, MovieTrackingTrack *track, MovieTrackingMarker *marker,
00384             float co[2], int width, int height)
00385 {
00386     float pos[2], dx, dy;
00387 
00388     add_v2_v2v2(pos, marker->pos, track->offset);
00389 
00390     dx = 12.0f / width / sc->zoom;
00391     dy = 12.0f / height /sc->zoom;
00392 
00393     dx = MIN2(dx, (track->pat_max[0] - track->pat_min[0]) / 2.0f);
00394     dy = MIN2(dy, (track->pat_max[1] - track->pat_min[1]) / 2.0f);
00395 
00396     return co[0] >= pos[0] - dx && co[0] <= pos[0] + dx && co[1] >= pos[1] - dy && co[1] <= pos[1] + dy;
00397 }

00402 
00403     WM_cursor_set(win, CURSOR_NONE);
00404 }

00406 static void show_cursor(bContext *C)

00408     wmWindow *win = CTX_wm_window(C);

00410     WM_cursor_set(win, CURSOR_STD);

00413 static void *slide_marker_customdata(bContext *C, wmEvent *event)
00414 {
00415     SpaceClip *sc = CTX_wm_space_clip(C);
00416     MovieClip *clip = ED_space_clip(sc);
00417     MovieTrackingTrack *track;
00418     int width, height;
00419     float co[2];
00420     void *customdata = NULL;
00421     ListBase *tracksbase = BKE_tracking_get_tracks(&clip->tracking);
00422 
00423     ED_space_clip_size(sc, &width, &height);
00424 
00425     if (width == 0 || height == 0)
00426         return NULL;
00427 
00428     ED_clip_mouse_pos(C, event, co);
00429 
00430     track = tracksbase->first;
00431     while (track) {
00432         if (TRACK_VIEW_SELECTED(sc, track) && (track->flag & TRACK_LOCKED) == 0) {
00433             MovieTrackingMarker *marker = BKE_tracking_get_marker(track, sc->user.framenr);
00434 
00435             if ((marker->flag & MARKER_DISABLED) == 0) {
00436                 if (!customdata)
00437                     if (mouse_on_offset(sc, track, marker, co, width, height))
00438                         customdata = create_slide_marker_data(sc, track, marker, event, TRACK_AREA_POINT, SLIDE_ACTION_POS, width, height);
00439 
00440                 if (sc->flag & SC_SHOW_MARKER_SEARCH) {
00441                     if (mouse_on_corner(sc, track, marker, TRACK_AREA_SEARCH, co, 1, width, height))
00442                         customdata = create_slide_marker_data(sc, track, marker, event, TRACK_AREA_SEARCH, SLIDE_ACTION_OFFSET, width, height);
00443                     else if (mouse_on_corner(sc, track, marker, TRACK_AREA_SEARCH, co, 0, width, height))
00444                         customdata = create_slide_marker_data(sc, track, marker, event, TRACK_AREA_SEARCH, SLIDE_ACTION_SIZE, width, height);
00445                 }
00446 
00447                 if (!customdata && (sc->flag & SC_SHOW_MARKER_PATTERN)) {
00448                     if (mouse_on_corner(sc, track, marker, TRACK_AREA_PAT, co, 1,  width, height))
00449                         customdata = create_slide_marker_data(sc, track, marker, event, TRACK_AREA_PAT, SLIDE_ACTION_OFFSET, width, height);
00450 
00451                     if (!customdata && mouse_on_corner(sc, track, marker, TRACK_AREA_PAT, co, 0, width, height))
00452                         customdata = create_slide_marker_data(sc, track, marker, event, TRACK_AREA_PAT, SLIDE_ACTION_SIZE, width, height);
00453                 }
00454 
00455                 if (customdata)
00456                     break;
00457             }
00458         }
00459 
00460         track = track->next;
00461     }
00462 
00463     return customdata;
00464 }
00465 
00466 static int slide_marker_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
00467 {
00468     SlideMarkerData *slidedata = slide_marker_customdata(C, event);
00469 
00470     if (slidedata) {
00471         SpaceClip *sc = CTX_wm_space_clip(C);
00472         MovieClip *clip = ED_space_clip(sc);
00473         MovieTracking *tracking = &clip->tracking;
00474 
00475         tracking->act_track = slidedata->track;
00476 
00477         op->customdata = slidedata;
00478 
00479         hide_cursor(C);
00480         WM_event_add_modal_handler(C, op);
00481 
00482         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM|ND_SELECT, NULL);
00483 
00484         return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
00485     }
00486 
00487     return OPERATOR_PASS_THROUGH;
00488 }
00489 
00490 static void cancel_mouse_slide(SlideMarkerData *data)
00491 {
00492     /* cancel sliding */
00493     if (data->area == TRACK_AREA_POINT) {
00494         if (data->action == SLIDE_ACTION_OFFSET)
00495             copy_v2_v2(data->offset, data->soff);
00496         else
00497             copy_v2_v2(data->pos, data->spos);
00498     }
00499     else {
00500         if (data->action == SLIDE_ACTION_SIZE) {
00501             copy_v2_v2(data->min, data->smin);
00502             copy_v2_v2(data->max, data->smax);
00503         }
00504         else {
00505             int a;
00506 
00507             for (a = 0; a<data->track->markersnr; a++)
00508                 copy_v2_v2(data->track->markers[a].pos, data->smarkers[a]);
00509 
00510             copy_v2_v2(data->offset, data->soff);
00511         }
00512     }
00513 }
00514 
00515 static void free_slide_data(SlideMarkerData *data)
00516 {
00517     if (data->smarkers)
00518         MEM_freeN(data->smarkers);
00519 
00520     MEM_freeN(data);
00521 }
00522 
00523 static int slide_marker_modal(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
00524 {
00525     SpaceClip *sc = CTX_wm_space_clip(C);
00526     SlideMarkerData *data = (SlideMarkerData *)op->customdata;
00527     float dx, dy, mdelta[2];
00528 
00529     switch(event->type) {
00530         case LEFTCTRLKEY:
00531         case RIGHTCTRLKEY:
00532         case LEFTSHIFTKEY:
00533         case RIGHTSHIFTKEY:
00534             if (data->action == SLIDE_ACTION_SIZE)
00535                 if (ELEM(event->type, LEFTCTRLKEY, RIGHTCTRLKEY))
00536                     data->lock = event->val == KM_RELEASE;
00537 
00538             if (ELEM(event->type, LEFTSHIFTKEY, RIGHTSHIFTKEY))
00539                 data->accurate = event->val == KM_PRESS;
00540 
00541             /* no break! update area size */
00542 
00543         case MOUSEMOVE:
00544             mdelta[0] = event->mval[0]-data->mval[0];
00545             mdelta[1] = event->mval[1]-data->mval[1];
00546 
00547             dx = mdelta[0] / data->width / sc->zoom;
00548 
00549             if (data->lock)
00550                 dy = -dx / data->height * data->width;
00551             else
00552                 dy = mdelta[1] / data->height / sc->zoom;
00553 
00554             if (data->accurate) {
00555                 dx /= 5;
00556                 dy /= 5;
00557             }
00558 
00559             if (data->area == TRACK_AREA_POINT) {
00560                 if (data->action == SLIDE_ACTION_OFFSET) {
00561                     data->offset[0] = data->soff[0] + dx;
00562                     data->offset[1] = data->soff[1] + dy;
00563                 }
00564                 else {
00565                     data->pos[0] = data->spos[0] + dx;
00566                     data->pos[1] = data->spos[1] + dy;
00567 
00568                     data->marker->flag &= ~MARKER_TRACKED;
00569                 }
00570 
00571                 WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_TRANSFORM, NULL);
00572                 DAG_id_tag_update(&sc->clip->id, 0);
00573             }
00574             else {
00575                 if (data->action == SLIDE_ACTION_SIZE) {
00576                     data->min[0] = data->smin[0] - dx;
00577                     data->max[0] = data->smax[0] + dx;
00578 
00579                     data->min[1] = data->smin[1] + dy;
00580                     data->max[1] = data->smax[1] - dy;
00581 
00582                     if (data->area == TRACK_AREA_SEARCH)
00583                         BKE_tracking_clamp_track(data->track, CLAMP_SEARCH_DIM);
00584                     else
00585                         BKE_tracking_clamp_track(data->track, CLAMP_PAT_DIM);
00586                 }
00587                 else {
00588                     float d[2] = {dx, dy};
00589 
00590                     if (data->area == TRACK_AREA_SEARCH) {
00591                         add_v2_v2v2(data->min, data->smin, d);
00592                         add_v2_v2v2(data->max, data->smax, d);
00593                     }
00594                     else {
00595                         int a;
00596 
00597                         for (a = 0; a<data->track->markersnr; a++)
00598                             add_v2_v2v2(data->track->markers[a].pos, data->smarkers[a], d);
00599 
00600                         sub_v2_v2v2(data->offset, data->soff, d);
00601                     }
00602 
00603                     if (data->area == TRACK_AREA_SEARCH)
00604                         BKE_tracking_clamp_track(data->track, CLAMP_SEARCH_POS);
00605                 }
00606             }
00607 
00608             WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_MOVIECLIP|NA_EDITED, NULL);
00609 
00610             break;
00611 
00612         case LEFTMOUSE:
00613             if (event->val == KM_RELEASE) {
00614                 free_slide_data(op->customdata);
00615 
00616                 show_cursor(C);
00617 
00618                 return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00619             }
00620 
00621             break;
00622 
00623         case ESCKEY:
00624             cancel_mouse_slide(op->customdata);
00625 
00626             free_slide_data(op->customdata);
00627 
00628             show_cursor(C);
00629 
00630             WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_MOVIECLIP|NA_EDITED, NULL);
00631 
00632             return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00633     }
00634 
00635     return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
00636 }
00637 
00638 void CLIP_OT_slide_marker(wmOperatorType *ot)
00639 {
00640     /* identifiers */
00641     ot->name = "Slide Marker";
00642     ot->description = "Slide marker areas";
00643     ot->idname = "CLIP_OT_slide_marker";
00644 
00645     /* api callbacks */
00646     ot->poll = space_clip_frame_poll;
00647     ot->invoke = slide_marker_invoke;
00648     ot->modal = slide_marker_modal;
00649 
00650     /* flags */
00651     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO|OPTYPE_GRAB_POINTER|OPTYPE_BLOCKING;
00652 
00653     /* properties */
00654     RNA_def_float_vector(ot->srna, "offset", 2, NULL, -FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX,
00655         "Offset", "Offset in floating point units, 1.0 is the width and height of the image", -FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX);
00656 }
00657 
00658 /********************** mouse select operator *********************/
00659 
00660 static int mouse_on_side(float co[2], float x1, float y1, float x2, float y2, float epsx, float epsy)
00661 {
00662     if (x1 > x2)
00663 
00664         SWAP(float, x1, x2);
00665 
00666     if (y1 > y2)
00667         SWAP(float, y1, y2);
00668 
00669     return (co[0] >= x1 - epsx && co[0] <= x2 + epsx) && (co[1] >= y1 - epsy && co[1] <= y2 + epsy);
00670 }
00671 
00672 static int mouse_on_rect(float co[2], float pos[2], float min[2], float max[2], float epsx, float epsy)
00673 {
00674     return mouse_on_side(co, pos[0]+min[0], pos[1]+min[1], pos[0]+max[0], pos[1]+min[1], epsx, epsy) ||
00675            mouse_on_side(co, pos[0]+min[0], pos[1]+min[1], pos[0]+min[0], pos[1]+max[1], epsx, epsy) ||
00676            mouse_on_side(co, pos[0]+min[0], pos[1]+max[1], pos[0]+max[0], pos[1]+max[1], epsx, epsy) ||
00677            mouse_on_side(co, pos[0]+max[0], pos[1]+min[1], pos[0]+max[0], pos[1]+max[1], epsx, epsy);
00678 }
00679 
00680 static int track_mouse_area(SpaceClip *sc, float co[2], MovieTrackingTrack *track)
00681 {
00682     MovieTrackingMarker *marker = BKE_tracking_get_marker(track, sc->user.framenr);
00683     float epsx, epsy;
00684     int width, height;
00685 
00686     ED_space_clip_size(sc, &width, &height);
00687 
00688     epsx = MIN4(track->pat_min[0]-track->search_min[0], track->search_max[0]-track->pat_max[0],
00689                fabsf(track->pat_min[0]), fabsf(track->pat_max[0])) / 2;
00690     epsy = MIN4(track->pat_min[1]-track->search_min[1], track->search_max[1]-track->pat_max[1],
00691                fabsf(track->pat_min[1]), fabsf(track->pat_max[1])) / 2;
00692 
00693     epsx = MAX2(epsx, 2.0f / width);
00694     epsy = MAX2(epsy, 2.0f / height);
00695 
00696     if (sc->flag & SC_SHOW_MARKER_SEARCH) {
00697         if (mouse_on_rect(co, marker->pos, track->search_min, track->search_max, epsx, epsy))
00698             return TRACK_AREA_SEARCH;
00699     }
00700 
00701     if ((marker->flag & MARKER_DISABLED)== 0) {
00702         if (sc->flag & SC_SHOW_MARKER_PATTERN)
00703             if (mouse_on_rect(co, marker->pos, track->pat_min, track->pat_max, epsx, epsy))
00704                 return TRACK_AREA_PAT;
00705 
00706         epsx = 12.0f / width;
00707         epsy = 12.0f / height;
00708 
00709         if (fabsf(co[0]-marker->pos[0]-track->offset[0])< epsx && fabsf(co[1]-marker->pos[1]-track->offset[1])<=epsy)
00710             return TRACK_AREA_POINT;
00711     }
00712 
00713     return TRACK_AREA_NONE;
00714 }
00715 
00716 static float dist_to_rect(float co[2], float pos[2], float min[2], float max[2])
00717 {
00718     float d1, d2, d3, d4;
00719     float p[2] = {co[0]-pos[0], co[1]-pos[1]};
00720     float v1[2] = {min[0], min[1]}, v2[2] = {max[0], min[1]},
00721           v3[2] = {max[0], max[1]}, v4[2] = {min[0], max[1]};
00722 
00723     d1 = dist_to_line_segment_v2(p, v1, v2);
00724     d2 = dist_to_line_segment_v2(p, v2, v3);
00725     d3 = dist_to_line_segment_v2(p, v3, v4);
00726     d4 = dist_to_line_segment_v2(p, v4, v1);
00727 
00728     return MIN4(d1, d2, d3, d4);
00729 }
00730 
00731 static MovieTrackingTrack *find_nearest_track(SpaceClip *sc, ListBase *tracksbase, float co[2])
00732 {
00733     MovieTrackingTrack *track = NULL, *cur;
00734     float mindist = 0.0f;
00735 
00736     cur = tracksbase->first;
00737     while (cur) {
00738         MovieTrackingMarker *marker = BKE_tracking_get_marker(cur, sc->user.framenr);
00739 
00740         if (((cur->flag & TRACK_HIDDEN) == 0) && MARKER_VISIBLE(sc, marker)) {
00741             float dist, d1, d2 = FLT_MAX, d3 = FLT_MAX;
00742 
00743             d1= sqrtf((co[0]-marker->pos[0]-cur->offset[0])*(co[0]-marker->pos[0]-cur->offset[0])+
00744                       (co[1]-marker->pos[1]-cur->offset[1])*(co[1]-marker->pos[1]-cur->offset[1])); /* distance to marker point */
00745 
00746             /* distance to pattern boundbox */
00747             if (sc->flag & SC_SHOW_MARKER_PATTERN)
00748                 d2= dist_to_rect(co, marker->pos, cur->pat_min, cur->pat_max);
00749 
00750             /* distance to search boundbox */
00751             if (sc->flag & SC_SHOW_MARKER_SEARCH && TRACK_VIEW_SELECTED(sc, cur))
00752                 d3= dist_to_rect(co, marker->pos, cur->search_min, cur->search_max);
00753 
00754             /* choose minimal distance. useful for cases of overlapped markers. */
00755             dist = MIN3(d1, d2, d3);
00756 
00757             if (track == NULL || dist<mindist) {
00758                 track = cur;
00759                 mindist = dist;
00760             }
00761         }
00762 
00763         cur = cur->next;
00764     }
00765 
00766     return track;
00767 }
00768 
00769 static int mouse_select(bContext *C, float co[2], int extend)
00770 {
00771     SpaceClip *sc = CTX_wm_space_clip(C);
00772     MovieClip *clip = ED_space_clip(sc);
00773     MovieTracking *tracking = &clip->tracking;
00774     ListBase *tracksbase = BKE_tracking_get_tracks(tracking);
00775     MovieTrackingTrack *act_track = BKE_tracking_active_track(tracking);
00776     MovieTrackingTrack *track = NULL;   /* selected marker */
00777 
00778     track = find_nearest_track(sc, tracksbase, co);
00779 
00780     if (track) {
00781         int area = track_mouse_area(sc, co, track);
00782 
00783         if (!extend || !TRACK_VIEW_SELECTED(sc, track))
00784             area = TRACK_AREA_ALL;
00785 
00786         if (extend && TRACK_AREA_SELECTED(track, area)) {
00787             if (track == act_track)
00788                 BKE_tracking_deselect_track(track, area);
00789             else
00790                 clip->tracking.act_track = track;
00791         }
00792         else {
00793             if (area == TRACK_AREA_POINT)
00794                 area = TRACK_AREA_ALL;
00795 
00796             BKE_tracking_select_track(tracksbase, track, area, extend);
00797             clip->tracking.act_track = track;
00798         }
00799     }
00800 
00801     if (!extend) {
00802         sc->xlockof = 0.0f;
00803         sc->ylockof = 0.0f;
00804     }
00805 
00806     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM|ND_SELECT, NULL);
00807 
00808     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00809 }
00810 
00811 static int select_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00812 {
00813     float co[2];
00814     int extend;
00815 
00816     RNA_float_get_array(op->ptr, "location", co);
00817     extend = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "extend");
00818 
00819     return mouse_select(C, co, extend);
00820 }
00821 
00822 static int select_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
00823 {
00824     float co[2];
00825     int extend = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "extend");
00826 
00827     if (!extend) {
00828         SlideMarkerData *slidedata = slide_marker_customdata(C, event);
00829 
00830         if (slidedata) {
00831             SpaceClip *sc = CTX_wm_space_clip(C);
00832             MovieClip *clip = ED_space_clip(sc);
00833 
00834             clip->tracking.act_track = slidedata->track;
00835 
00836             WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM|ND_SELECT, NULL);
00837 
00838             MEM_freeN(slidedata);
00839 
00840             return OPERATOR_PASS_THROUGH;
00841         }
00842     }
00843 
00844     ED_clip_mouse_pos(C, event, co);
00845     RNA_float_set_array(op->ptr, "location", co);
00846 
00847     return select_exec(C, op);
00848 }
00849 
00850 void CLIP_OT_select(wmOperatorType *ot)
00851 {
00852     /* identifiers */
00853     ot->name = "Select";
00854     ot->description = "Select tracking markers";
00855     ot->idname = "CLIP_OT_select";
00856 
00857     /* api callbacks */
00858     ot->exec = select_exec;
00859     ot->invoke = select_invoke;
00860     ot->poll = ED_space_clip_poll;
00861 
00862     /* flags */
00863     ot->flag = OPTYPE_UNDO;
00864 
00865     /* properties */
00866     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "extend", 0,
00867         "Extend", "Extend selection rather than clearing the existing selection");
00868     RNA_def_float_vector(ot->srna, "location", 2, NULL, -FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX,
00869         "Location", "Mouse location in normalized coordinates, 0.0 to 1.0 is within the image bounds", -100.0f, 100.0f);
00870 }
00871 
00872 /********************** border select operator *********************/
00873 
00874 static int border_select_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00875 {
00876     SpaceClip *sc = CTX_wm_space_clip(C);
00877     MovieClip *clip = ED_space_clip(sc);
00878     MovieTrackingTrack *track;
00879     ListBase *tracksbase = BKE_tracking_get_tracks(&clip->tracking);
00880     rcti rect;
00881     rctf rectf;
00882     int change = FALSE, mode, extend;
00883 
00884     /* get rectangle from operator */
00885     rect.xmin = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "xmin");
00886     rect.ymin = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "ymin");
00887     rect.xmax = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "xmax");
00888     rect.ymax = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "ymax");
00889 
00890     ED_clip_point_stable_pos(C, rect.xmin, rect.ymin, &rectf.xmin, &rectf.ymin);
00891     ED_clip_point_stable_pos(C, rect.xmax, rect.ymax, &rectf.xmax, &rectf.ymax);
00892 
00893     mode = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "gesture_mode");
00894     extend = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "extend");
00895 
00896     /* do actual selection */
00897     track = tracksbase->first;
00898     while (track) {
00899         if ((track->flag & TRACK_HIDDEN) == 0) {
00900             MovieTrackingMarker *marker = BKE_tracking_get_marker(track, sc->user.framenr);
00901 
00902             if (MARKER_VISIBLE(sc, marker)) {
00903                 if (BLI_in_rctf(&rectf, marker->pos[0], marker->pos[1])) {
00904                     BKE_tracking_track_flag(track, TRACK_AREA_ALL, SELECT, mode!=GESTURE_MODAL_SELECT);
00905                 }
00906                 else if (!extend) {
00907                     BKE_tracking_track_flag(track, TRACK_AREA_ALL, SELECT, 1);
00908                 }
00909 
00910                 change = TRUE;
00911             }
00912         }
00913 
00914         track = track->next;
00915     }
00916 
00917     if (change) {
00918         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM|ND_SELECT, NULL);
00919 
00920         return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00921     }
00922 
00923     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00924 }
00925 
00926 void CLIP_OT_select_border(wmOperatorType *ot)
00927 {
00928     /* identifiers */
00929     ot->name = "Border Select";
00930     ot->description = "Select markers using border selection";
00931     ot->idname = "CLIP_OT_select_border";
00932 
00933     /* api callbacks */
00934     ot->invoke = WM_border_select_invoke;
00935     ot->exec = border_select_exec;
00936     ot->modal = WM_border_select_modal;
00937     ot->poll = ED_space_clip_poll;
00938 
00939     /* flags */
00940     ot->flag = OPTYPE_UNDO;
00941 
00942     /* properties */
00943     WM_operator_properties_gesture_border(ot, TRUE);
00944 }
00945 
00946 /********************** circle select operator *********************/
00947 
00948 static int marker_inside_ellipse(MovieTrackingMarker *marker, float offset[2], float ellipse[2])
00949 {
00950     /* normalized ellipse: ell[0] = scaleX, ell[1] = scaleY */
00951     float x, y;
00952 
00953     x = (marker->pos[0] - offset[0])*ellipse[0];
00954     y = (marker->pos[1] - offset[1])*ellipse[1];
00955 
00956     return x*x + y*y < 1.0f;
00957 }
00958 
00959 static int circle_select_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00960 {
00961     SpaceClip *sc = CTX_wm_space_clip(C);
00962     MovieClip *clip = ED_space_clip(sc);
00963     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
00964     MovieTrackingTrack *track;
00965     ListBase *tracksbase = BKE_tracking_get_tracks(&clip->tracking);
00966     int x, y, radius, width, height, mode, change = FALSE;
00967     float zoomx, zoomy, offset[2], ellipse[2];
00968 
00969     /* get operator properties */
00970     x = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "x");
00971     y = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "y");
00972     radius = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "radius");
00973 
00974     mode = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "gesture_mode");
00975 
00976     /* compute ellipse and position in unified coordinates */
00977     ED_space_clip_size(sc, &width, &height);
00978     ED_space_clip_zoom(sc, ar, &zoomx, &zoomy);
00979 
00980     ellipse[0] = width * zoomx / radius;
00981     ellipse[1] = height * zoomy / radius;
00982 
00983     ED_clip_point_stable_pos(C, x, y, &offset[0], &offset[1]);
00984 
00985     /* do selection */
00986     track = tracksbase->first;
00987     while (track) {
00988         if ((track->flag & TRACK_HIDDEN) == 0) {
00989             MovieTrackingMarker *marker = BKE_tracking_get_marker(track, sc->user.framenr);
00990 
00991             if (MARKER_VISIBLE(sc, marker) && marker_inside_ellipse(marker, offset, ellipse)) {
00992                 BKE_tracking_track_flag(track, TRACK_AREA_ALL, SELECT, mode!=GESTURE_MODAL_SELECT);
00993 
00994                 change = TRUE;
00995             }
00996         }
00997 
00998         track = track->next;
00999     }
01000 
01001     if (change) {
01002         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM|ND_SELECT, NULL);
01003 
01004         return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01005     }
01006 
01007     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01008 }
01009 
01010 void CLIP_OT_select_circle(wmOperatorType *ot)
01011 {
01012     /* identifiers */
01013     ot->name = "Circle Select";
01014     ot->description = "Select markers using circle selection";
01015     ot->idname = "CLIP_OT_select_circle";
01016 
01017     /* api callbacks */
01018     ot->invoke = WM_gesture_circle_invoke;
01019     ot->modal = WM_gesture_circle_modal;
01020     ot->exec = circle_select_exec;
01021     ot->poll = ED_space_clip_poll;
01022 
01023     /* flags */
01024     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
01025 
01026     /* properties */
01027     RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "x", 0, INT_MIN, INT_MAX, "X", "", INT_MIN, INT_MAX);
01028     RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "y", 0, INT_MIN, INT_MAX, "Y", "", INT_MIN, INT_MAX);
01029     RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "radius", 0, INT_MIN, INT_MAX, "Radius", "", INT_MIN, INT_MAX);
01030     RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "gesture_mode", 0, INT_MIN, INT_MAX, "Gesture Mode", "", INT_MIN, INT_MAX);
01031 }
01032 
01033 /********************** select all operator *********************/
01034 
01035 static int select_all_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01036 {
01037     SpaceClip *sc = CTX_wm_space_clip(C);
01038     MovieClip *clip = ED_space_clip(sc);
01039     MovieTrackingTrack *track = NULL;   /* selected track */
01040     MovieTrackingMarker *marker;
01041     ListBase *tracksbase = BKE_tracking_get_tracks(&clip->tracking);
01042     int action = RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "action");
01043     int framenr = sc->user.framenr;
01044     int has_selection = FALSE;
01045 
01046     if (action == SEL_TOGGLE) {
01047         action = SEL_SELECT;
01048         track = tracksbase->first;
01049         while (track) {
01050             if (TRACK_VIEW_SELECTED(sc, track)) {
01051                 marker = BKE_tracking_get_marker(track, framenr);
01052 
01053                 if (MARKER_VISIBLE(sc, marker)) {
01054                     action = SEL_DESELECT;
01055                     break;
01056                 }
01057             }
01058 
01059             track = track->next;
01060         }
01061     }
01062 
01063     track = tracksbase->first;
01064     while (track) {
01065         if ((track->flag & TRACK_HIDDEN)==0) {
01066             marker = BKE_tracking_get_marker(track, framenr);
01067 
01068             if (MARKER_VISIBLE(sc, marker)) {
01069                 switch (action) {
01070                     case SEL_SELECT:
01071                         track->flag |= SELECT;
01072                         track->pat_flag |= SELECT;
01073                         track->search_flag |= SELECT;
01074                         break;
01075                     case SEL_DESELECT:
01076                         track->flag &= ~SELECT;
01077                         track->pat_flag &= ~SELECT;
01078                         track->search_flag &= ~SELECT;
01079                         break;
01080                     case SEL_INVERT:
01081                         track->flag ^= SELECT;
01082                         track->pat_flag ^= SELECT;
01083                         track->search_flag ^= SELECT;
01084                         break;
01085                 }
01086             }
01087         }
01088 
01089         if (TRACK_VIEW_SELECTED(sc, track))
01090             has_selection = TRUE;
01091 
01092         track = track->next;
01093     }
01094 
01095     if (!has_selection)
01096         sc->flag &= ~SC_LOCK_SELECTION;
01097 
01098     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM|ND_SELECT, NULL);
01099 
01100     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01101 }
01102 
01103 void CLIP_OT_select_all(wmOperatorType *ot)
01104 {
01105     /* identifiers */
01106     ot->name = "(De)select All";
01107     ot->description = "Change selection of all tracking markers";
01108     ot->idname = "CLIP_OT_select_all";
01109 
01110     /* api callbacks */
01111     ot->exec = select_all_exec;
01112     ot->poll = ED_space_clip_poll;
01113 
01114     /* flags */
01115     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
01116 
01117     WM_operator_properties_select_all(ot);
01118 }
01119 
01120 /********************** select grouped operator *********************/
01121 
01122 static int select_groped_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01123 {
01124     SpaceClip *sc = CTX_wm_space_clip(C);
01125     MovieClip *clip = ED_space_clip(sc);
01126     MovieTrackingTrack *track;
01127     MovieTrackingMarker *marker;
01128     MovieTracking *tracking = &clip->tracking;
01129     ListBase *tracksbase = BKE_tracking_get_tracks(tracking);
01130     int group = RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "group");
01131 
01132     track = tracksbase->first;
01133     while (track) {
01134         int ok = FALSE;
01135 
01136         marker = BKE_tracking_get_marker(track, sc->user.framenr);
01137 
01138         if (group == 0) { /* Keyframed */
01139             ok = marker->framenr == sc->user.framenr && (marker->flag & MARKER_TRACKED)==0;
01140         }
01141         else if (group == 1) { /* Estimated */
01142             ok = marker->framenr != sc->user.framenr;
01143         }
01144         else if (group == 2) { /* tracked */
01145             ok = marker->framenr == sc->user.framenr && (marker->flag & MARKER_TRACKED);
01146         }
01147         else if (group == 3) { /* locked */
01148             ok = track->flag & TRACK_LOCKED;
01149         }
01150         else if (group == 4) { /* disabled */
01151             ok = marker->flag & MARKER_DISABLED;
01152         }
01153         else if (group == 5) { /* color */
01154             MovieTrackingTrack *act_track = BKE_tracking_active_track(tracking);
01155 
01156             if (act_track) {
01157                 ok = (track->flag & TRACK_CUSTOMCOLOR) == (act_track->flag & TRACK_CUSTOMCOLOR);
01158 
01159                 if (ok && track->flag & TRACK_CUSTOMCOLOR)
01160                     ok = equals_v3v3(track->color, act_track->color);
01161             }
01162         }
01163         else if (group == 6) { /* failed */
01164             ok = (track->flag & TRACK_HAS_BUNDLE) == 0;
01165         }
01166 
01167         if (ok) {
01168             track->flag |= SELECT;
01169             if (sc->flag & SC_SHOW_MARKER_PATTERN)
01170                 track->pat_flag |= SELECT;
01171             if (sc->flag & SC_SHOW_MARKER_SEARCH)
01172                 track->search_flag |= SELECT;
01173         }
01174 
01175         track = track->next;
01176     }
01177 
01178     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_MOVIECLIP|ND_DISPLAY, clip);
01179 
01180     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01181 }
01182 
01183 void CLIP_OT_select_grouped(wmOperatorType *ot)
01184 {
01185     static EnumPropertyItem select_group_items[] = {
01186             {0, "KEYFRAMED", 0, "Keyframed tracks", "Select all keyframed tracks"},
01187             {1, "ESTIMATED", 0, "Estimated tracks", "Select all estimated tracks"},
01188             {2, "TRACKED", 0, "Tracked tracks", "Select all tracked tracks"},
01189             {3, "LOCKED", 0, "Locked tracks", "Select all locked tracks"},
01190             {4, "DISABLED", 0, "Disabled tracks", "Select all disabled tracks"},
01191             {5, "COLOR", 0, "Tracks with same color", "Select all tracks with same color as active track"},
01192             {6, "FAILED", 0, "Failed Tracks", "Select all tracks which failed to be reconstructed"},
01193             {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}
01194     };
01195 
01196     /* identifiers */
01197     ot->name = "Select Grouped";
01198     ot->description = "Select all tracks from specified group";
01199     ot->idname = "CLIP_OT_select_grouped";
01200 
01201     /* api callbacks */
01202     ot->exec = select_groped_exec;
01203     ot->poll = space_clip_frame_poll;
01204 
01205     /* flags */
01206     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
01207 
01208     /* proeprties */
01209     RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "group", select_group_items, TRACK_CLEAR_REMAINED, "Action", "Clear action to execute");
01210 }
01211 
01212 /********************** track operator *********************/
01213 
01214 typedef struct TrackMarkersJob {
01215     struct MovieTrackingContext *context;   /* tracking context */
01216     int sfra, efra, lastfra;    /* Start, end and recently tracked frames */
01217     int backwards;              /* Backwards tracking flag */
01218     MovieClip *clip;            /* Clip which is tracking */
01219     float delay;                /* Delay in milliseconds to allow tracking at fixed FPS */
01220 
01221     struct Main *main;
01222     struct Scene *scene;
01223     struct bScreen *screen;
01224 } TrackMarkersJob;
01225 
01226 static int track_markers_testbreak(void)
01227 {
01228     return G.afbreek;
01229 }
01230 
01231 static int track_count_markers(SpaceClip *sc, MovieClip *clip)
01232 {
01233     int tot = 0;
01234     ListBase *tracksbase = BKE_tracking_get_tracks(&clip->tracking);
01235     MovieTrackingTrack *track;
01236     int framenr = sc->user.framenr;
01237 
01238     track = tracksbase->first;
01239     while (track) {
01240         if (TRACK_VIEW_SELECTED(sc, track) && (track->flag & TRACK_LOCKED) == 0) {
01241             MovieTrackingMarker *marker = BKE_tracking_get_marker(track, framenr);
01242 
01243             if (!marker || (marker->flag & MARKER_DISABLED) == 0)
01244                 tot++;
01245         }
01246 
01247         track = track->next;
01248     }
01249 
01250     return tot;
01251 }
01252 
01253 static void clear_invisible_track_selection(SpaceClip *sc, MovieClip *clip)
01254 {
01255     ListBase *tracksbase = BKE_tracking_get_tracks(&clip->tracking);
01256     int hidden = 0;
01257 
01258     if ((sc->flag & SC_SHOW_MARKER_PATTERN)==0)
01259         hidden |= TRACK_AREA_PAT;
01260 
01261     if ((sc->flag & SC_SHOW_MARKER_SEARCH)==0)
01262         hidden |= TRACK_AREA_SEARCH;
01263 
01264     if (hidden) {
01265         MovieTrackingTrack *track = tracksbase->first;
01266 
01267         while (track) {
01268             if ((track->flag & TRACK_HIDDEN) == 0)
01269                 BKE_tracking_track_flag(track, hidden, SELECT, 1);
01270 
01271             track = track->next;
01272         }
01273     }
01274 }
01275 
01276 static void track_init_markers(SpaceClip *sc, MovieClip *clip, int *frames_limit_r)
01277 {
01278     ListBase *tracksbase = BKE_tracking_get_tracks(&clip->tracking);
01279     MovieTrackingTrack *track;
01280     int framenr = sc->user.framenr;
01281     int frames_limit = 0;
01282 
01283     clear_invisible_track_selection(sc, clip);
01284 
01285     track = tracksbase->first;
01286     while (track) {
01287         if (TRACK_VIEW_SELECTED(sc, track)) {
01288             if ((track->flag & TRACK_HIDDEN)==0 && (track->flag & TRACK_LOCKED)==0) {
01289                 BKE_tracking_ensure_marker(track, framenr);
01290 
01291                 if (track->frames_limit) {
01292                     if (frames_limit == 0)
01293                         frames_limit = track->frames_limit;
01294                     else
01295                         frames_limit = MIN2(frames_limit, track->frames_limit);
01296                 }
01297             }
01298         }
01299 
01300         track = track->next;
01301     }
01302 
01303     *frames_limit_r = frames_limit;
01304 }
01305 
01306 static int track_markers_check_direction(int backwards, int curfra, int efra)
01307 {
01308     if (backwards) {
01309         if (curfra < efra)
01310             return FALSE;
01311     }
01312     else {
01313         if (curfra > efra)
01314             return FALSE;
01315     }
01316 
01317     return TRUE;
01318 }
01319 
01320 static int track_markers_initjob(bContext *C, TrackMarkersJob *tmj, int backwards)
01321 {
01322     SpaceClip *sc = CTX_wm_space_clip(C);
01323     MovieClip *clip = ED_space_clip(sc);
01324     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
01325     MovieTrackingSettings *settings = &clip->tracking.settings;
01326     int frames_limit;
01327 
01328     track_init_markers(sc, clip, &frames_limit);
01329 
01330     tmj->sfra = sc->user.framenr;
01331     tmj->clip = clip;
01332     tmj->backwards = backwards;
01333 
01334     if (backwards)
01335         tmj->efra = SFRA;
01336     else
01337         tmj->efra = EFRA;
01338 
01339     /* limit frames to be tracked by user setting */
01340     if (frames_limit) {
01341         if (backwards)
01342             tmj->efra = MAX2(tmj->efra, tmj->sfra - frames_limit);
01343         else
01344             tmj->efra = MIN2(tmj->efra, tmj->sfra + frames_limit);
01345     }
01346 
01347     if (settings->speed != TRACKING_SPEED_FASTEST) {
01348         tmj->delay = 1.0f / scene->r.frs_sec * 1000.0f;
01349 
01350         if (settings->speed == TRACKING_SPEED_HALF)
01351             tmj->delay *= 2;
01352         else if (settings->speed == TRACKING_SPEED_QUARTER)
01353             tmj->delay *= 4;
01354         else if (settings->speed == TRACKING_SPEED_DOUBLE)
01355             tmj->delay /= 2;
01356     }
01357 
01358     tmj->context = BKE_tracking_context_new(clip, &sc->user, backwards, 1);
01359 
01360     clip->tracking_context = tmj->context;
01361 
01362     tmj->lastfra = tmj->sfra;
01363 
01364     /* XXX: silly to store this, but this data is needed to update scene and movie-clip
01365      *      frame numbers when tracking is finished. This introduces better feedback for artists.
01366      *      Maybe there's another way to solve this problem, but can't think better way atm.
01367      *      Anyway, this way isn't more unstable as animation rendering animation
01368      *      which uses the same approach (except storing screen). */
01369     tmj->scene = scene;
01370     tmj->main = CTX_data_main(C);
01371     tmj->screen = CTX_wm_screen(C);
01372 
01373     return track_markers_check_direction(backwards, tmj->sfra, tmj->efra);
01374 }
01375 
01376 static void track_markers_startjob(void *tmv, short *stop, short *do_update, float *progress)
01377 {
01378     TrackMarkersJob *tmj = (TrackMarkersJob *)tmv;
01379     int framenr = tmj->sfra;
01380     //double t = PIL_check_seconds_timer();
01381 
01382     while (framenr != tmj->efra) {
01383         if (tmj->delay > 0) {
01384             /* tracking should happen with fixed fps. Calculate time
01385              * using current timer value before tracking frame and after.
01386              *
01387              * Small (and maybe unneeded optimization): do not calculate exec_time
01388              * for "Fastest" tracking */
01389 
01390             double start_time = PIL_check_seconds_timer(), exec_time;
01391 
01392             if (!BKE_tracking_next(tmj->context))
01393                 break;
01394 
01395             exec_time = PIL_check_seconds_timer()-start_time;
01396             if (tmj->delay > (float)exec_time)
01397                 PIL_sleep_ms(tmj->delay-(float)exec_time);
01398         }
01399         else if (!BKE_tracking_next(tmj->context))
01400                 break;
01401 
01402         *do_update = TRUE;
01403         *progress = (float)(framenr-tmj->sfra) / (tmj->efra-tmj->sfra);
01404 
01405         if (tmj->backwards)
01406             framenr--;
01407         else
01408             framenr++;
01409 
01410         tmj->lastfra = framenr;
01411 
01412         if (*stop || track_markers_testbreak())
01413             break;
01414     }
01415 
01416     //printf("Tracking time: %lf\n", PIL_check_seconds_timer()-t);
01417 }
01418 
01419 static void track_markers_updatejob(void *tmv)
01420 {
01421     TrackMarkersJob *tmj = (TrackMarkersJob *)tmv;
01422 
01423     BKE_tracking_sync(tmj->context);
01424 }
01425 
01426 static void track_markers_freejob(void *tmv)
01427 {
01428     TrackMarkersJob *tmj = (TrackMarkersJob *)tmv;
01429 
01430     tmj->clip->tracking_context = NULL;
01431     tmj->scene->r.cfra = tmj->lastfra;
01432     ED_update_for_newframe(tmj->main, tmj->scene, tmj->screen, 0);
01433 
01434     BKE_tracking_sync(tmj->context);
01435     BKE_tracking_context_free(tmj->context);
01436 
01437     MEM_freeN(tmj);
01438 
01439     WM_main_add_notifier(NC_SCENE|ND_FRAME, tmj->scene);
01440 }
01441 
01442 static int track_markers_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01443 {
01444     SpaceClip *sc = CTX_wm_space_clip(C);
01445     MovieClip *clip = ED_space_clip(sc);
01446     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
01447     struct MovieTrackingContext *context;
01448     int framenr = sc->user.framenr;
01449     int sfra = framenr, efra;
01450     int backwards = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "backwards");
01451     int sequence = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "sequence");
01452     int frames_limit;
01453 
01454     if (track_count_markers(sc, clip)==0)
01455         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01456 
01457     track_init_markers(sc, clip, &frames_limit);
01458 
01459     if (backwards)
01460         efra = SFRA;
01461     else
01462         efra = EFRA;
01463 
01464     /* limit frames to be tracked by user setting */
01465     if (frames_limit) {
01466         if (backwards) efra = MAX2(efra, sfra-frames_limit);
01467         else efra = MIN2(efra, sfra+frames_limit);
01468     }
01469 
01470     if (!track_markers_check_direction(backwards, framenr, efra))
01471         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01472 
01473     /* do not disable tracks due to threshold when tracking frame-by-frame */
01474     context = BKE_tracking_context_new(clip, &sc->user, backwards, sequence);
01475 
01476     while (framenr != efra) {
01477         if (!BKE_tracking_next(context))
01478             break;
01479 
01480         if (backwards) framenr--;
01481         else framenr++;
01482 
01483         if (!sequence)
01484             break;
01485     }
01486 
01487     BKE_tracking_sync(context);
01488     BKE_tracking_context_free(context);
01489 
01490     /* update scene current frame to the lastes tracked frame */
01491     scene->r.cfra = framenr;
01492 
01493     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_MOVIECLIP|NA_EVALUATED, clip);
01494     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE|ND_FRAME, scene);
01495 
01496     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01497 }
01498 
01499 static int track_markers_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *UNUSED(event))
01500 {
01501     TrackMarkersJob *tmj;
01502     ScrArea *sa = CTX_wm_area(C);
01503     SpaceClip *sc = CTX_wm_space_clip(C);
01504     MovieClip *clip = ED_space_clip(sc);
01505     wmJob *steve;
01506     int backwards = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "backwards");
01507     int sequence = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "sequence");
01508 
01509     if (WM_jobs_test(CTX_wm_manager(C), CTX_wm_area(C))) {
01510         /* only one tracking is allowed at a time */
01511         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01512     }
01513 
01514     if (clip->tracking_context)
01515         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01516 
01517     if (track_count_markers(sc, clip)==0)
01518         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01519 
01520     if (!sequence)
01521         return track_markers_exec(C, op);
01522 
01523     tmj = MEM_callocN(sizeof(TrackMarkersJob), "TrackMarkersJob data");
01524     if (!track_markers_initjob(C, tmj, backwards)) {
01525         track_markers_freejob(tmj);
01526 
01527         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01528     }
01529 
01530     /* setup job */
01531     steve = WM_jobs_get(CTX_wm_manager(C), CTX_wm_window(C), sa, "Track Markers", WM_JOB_PROGRESS);
01532     WM_jobs_customdata(steve, tmj, track_markers_freejob);
01533 
01534     /* if there's delay set in tracking job, tracking should happen
01535      * with fixed FPS. To deal with editor refresh we have to synchronize
01536      * tracks from job and tracks in clip. Do this in timer callback
01537      * to prevent threading conflicts. */
01538     if (tmj->delay>0) WM_jobs_timer(steve, tmj->delay/1000.0f, NC_MOVIECLIP|NA_EVALUATED, 0);
01539     else WM_jobs_timer(steve, 0.2, NC_MOVIECLIP|NA_EVALUATED, 0);
01540 
01541     WM_jobs_callbacks(steve, track_markers_startjob, NULL, track_markers_updatejob, NULL);
01542 
01543     G.afbreek = 0;
01544 
01545     WM_jobs_start(CTX_wm_manager(C), steve);
01546     WM_cursor_wait(0);
01547 
01548     /* add modal handler for ESC */
01549     WM_event_add_modal_handler(C, op);
01550 
01551     return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
01552 }
01553 
01554 static int track_markers_modal(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op), wmEvent *event)
01555 {
01556     /* no running tracking, remove handler and pass through */
01557     if (0==WM_jobs_test(CTX_wm_manager(C), CTX_wm_area(C)))
01558         return OPERATOR_FINISHED|OPERATOR_PASS_THROUGH;
01559 
01560     /* running tracking */
01561     switch (event->type) {
01562         case ESCKEY:
01563             return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
01564             break;
01565     }
01566 
01567     return OPERATOR_PASS_THROUGH;
01568 }
01569 
01570 void CLIP_OT_track_markers(wmOperatorType *ot)
01571 {
01572     /* identifiers */
01573     ot->name = "Track Markers";
01574     ot->description = "Track selected markers";
01575     ot->idname = "CLIP_OT_track_markers";
01576 
01577     /* api callbacks */
01578     ot->exec = track_markers_exec;
01579     ot->invoke = track_markers_invoke;
01580     ot->poll = space_clip_frame_poll;
01581     ot->modal = track_markers_modal;
01582 
01583     /* flags */
01584     ot->flag = OPTYPE_UNDO;
01585 
01586     /* properties */
01587     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "backwards", 0, "Backwards", "Do backwards tracking");
01588     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "sequence", 0, "Track Sequence", "Track marker during image sequence rather than single image");
01589 }
01590 
01591 /********************** solve camera operator *********************/
01592 
01593 typedef struct {
01594     Scene *scene;
01595     MovieClip *clip;
01596     MovieClipUser user;
01597 
01598     ReportList *reports;
01599 
01600     char stats_message[256];
01601 
01602     struct MovieReconstructContext *context;
01603 } SolveCameraJob;
01604 
01605 static int solve_camera_initjob(bContext *C, SolveCameraJob *scj, wmOperator *op, char *error_msg, int max_error)
01606 {
01607     SpaceClip *sc = CTX_wm_space_clip(C);
01608     MovieClip *clip = ED_space_clip(sc);
01609     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
01610     MovieTracking *tracking = &clip->tracking;
01611     MovieTrackingSettings *settings = &clip->tracking.settings;
01612     MovieTrackingObject *object = BKE_tracking_active_object(tracking);
01613     int width, height;
01614 
01615     if (!BKE_tracking_can_reconstruct(tracking, object, error_msg, max_error))
01616         return 0;
01617 
01618     /* could fail if footage uses images with different sizes */
01619     BKE_movieclip_get_size(clip, &sc->user, &width, &height);
01620 
01621     scj->clip = clip;
01622     scj->scene = scene;
01623     scj->reports = op->reports;
01624     scj->user = sc->user;
01625 
01626     scj->context = BKE_tracking_reconstruction_context_new(tracking, object,
01627             settings->keyframe1, settings->keyframe2, width, height);
01628 
01629     tracking->stats = MEM_callocN(sizeof(MovieTrackingStats), "solve camera stats");
01630 
01631     return 1;
01632 }
01633 
01634 static void solve_camera_updatejob(void *scv)
01635 {
01636     SolveCameraJob *scj = (SolveCameraJob *)scv;
01637     MovieTracking *tracking = &scj->clip->tracking;
01638 
01639     BLI_strncpy(tracking->stats->message, scj->stats_message, sizeof(tracking->stats->message));
01640 }
01641 
01642 static void solve_camera_startjob(void *scv, short *stop, short *do_update, float *progress)
01643 {
01644     SolveCameraJob *scj = (SolveCameraJob *)scv;
01645 
01646     BKE_tracking_solve_reconstruction(scj->context, stop, do_update, progress,
01647             scj->stats_message, sizeof(scj->stats_message));
01648 }
01649 
01650 static void solve_camera_freejob(void *scv)
01651 {
01652     SolveCameraJob *scj = (SolveCameraJob *)scv;
01653     MovieTracking *tracking = &scj->clip->tracking;
01654     Scene *scene = scj->scene;
01655     MovieClip *clip = scj->clip;
01656     int solved;
01657 
01658     if (!scj->context) {
01659         /* job weren't fully initialized due to some error */
01660         MEM_freeN(scj);
01661         return;
01662     }
01663 
01664     solved = BKE_tracking_finish_reconstruction(scj->context, tracking);
01665 
01666     if (!solved)
01667         BKE_report(scj->reports, RPT_WARNING, "Some data failed to reconstruct, see console for details");
01668     else
01669         BKE_reportf(scj->reports, RPT_INFO, "Average re-projection error %.3f", tracking->reconstruction.error);
01670 
01671     /* set currently solved clip as active for scene */
01672     if (scene->clip)
01673         id_us_min(&clip->id);
01674 
01675     scene->clip = clip;
01676     id_us_plus(&clip->id);
01677 
01678     /* set blender camera focal length so result would look fine there */
01679     if (scene->camera) {
01680         Camera *camera = (Camera*)scene->camera->data;
01681         int width, height;
01682 
01683         BKE_movieclip_get_size(clip, &scj->user, &width, &height);
01684 
01685         BKE_tracking_camera_to_blender(tracking, scene, camera, width, height);
01686 
01687         WM_main_add_notifier(NC_OBJECT, camera);
01688     }
01689 
01690     MEM_freeN(tracking->stats);
01691     tracking->stats = NULL;
01692 
01693     DAG_id_tag_update(&clip->id, 0);
01694 
01695     WM_main_add_notifier(NC_MOVIECLIP|NA_EVALUATED, clip);
01696     WM_main_add_notifier(NC_OBJECT|ND_TRANSFORM, NULL);
01697 
01698     /* update active clip displayed in scene buttons */
01699     WM_main_add_notifier(NC_SCENE, scene);
01700 
01701     BKE_tracking_reconstruction_context_free(scj->context);
01702     MEM_freeN(scj);
01703 }
01704 
01705 static int solve_camera_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01706 {
01707     SolveCameraJob *scj;
01708     char error_msg[256] = "\0";
01709 
01710     scj = MEM_callocN(sizeof(SolveCameraJob), "SolveCameraJob data");
01711     if (!solve_camera_initjob(C, scj, op, error_msg, sizeof(error_msg))) {
01712         if (error_msg[0])
01713             BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, error_msg);
01714 
01715         solve_camera_freejob(scj);
01716 
01717         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01718     }
01719 
01720     solve_camera_startjob(scj, NULL, NULL, NULL);
01721 
01722     solve_camera_freejob(scj);
01723 
01724     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01725 }
01726 
01727 static int solve_camera_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *UNUSED(event))
01728 {
01729     SolveCameraJob *scj;
01730     ScrArea *sa = CTX_wm_area(C);
01731     SpaceClip *sc = CTX_wm_space_clip(C);
01732     MovieClip *clip = ED_space_clip(sc);
01733     MovieTracking *tracking = &clip->tracking;
01734     MovieTrackingReconstruction *reconstruction = BKE_tracking_get_reconstruction(tracking);
01735     wmJob *steve;
01736     char error_msg[256] = "\0";
01737 
01738     if (WM_jobs_test(CTX_wm_manager(C), CTX_wm_area(C))) {
01739         /* only one solve is allowed at a time */
01740         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01741     }
01742 
01743     scj = MEM_callocN(sizeof(SolveCameraJob), "SolveCameraJob data");
01744     if (!solve_camera_initjob(C, scj, op, error_msg, sizeof(error_msg))) {
01745         if (error_msg[0])
01746             BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, error_msg);
01747 
01748         solve_camera_freejob(scj);
01749 
01750         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01751     }
01752 
01753     BLI_strncpy(tracking->stats->message, "Solving camera | Preparing solve", sizeof(tracking->stats->message));
01754 
01755     /* hide reconstruction statistics from previous solve */
01756     reconstruction->flag &= ~TRACKING_RECONSTRUCTED;
01757     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_MOVIECLIP|NA_EVALUATED, clip);
01758 
01759     /* setup job */
01760     steve = WM_jobs_get(CTX_wm_manager(C), CTX_wm_window(C), sa, "Solve Camera", WM_JOB_PROGRESS);
01761     WM_jobs_customdata(steve, scj, solve_camera_freejob);
01762     WM_jobs_timer(steve, 0.1, NC_MOVIECLIP|NA_EVALUATED, 0);
01763     WM_jobs_callbacks(steve, solve_camera_startjob, NULL, solve_camera_updatejob, NULL);
01764 
01765     G.afbreek = 0;
01766 
01767     WM_jobs_start(CTX_wm_manager(C), steve);
01768     WM_cursor_wait(0);
01769 
01770     /* add modal handler for ESC */
01771     WM_event_add_modal_handler(C, op);
01772 
01773     return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
01774 }
01775 
01776 static int solve_camera_modal(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op), wmEvent *event)
01777 {
01778     /* no running solver, remove handler and pass through */
01779     if (0 == WM_jobs_test(CTX_wm_manager(C), CTX_wm_area(C)))
01780         return OPERATOR_FINISHED|OPERATOR_PASS_THROUGH;
01781 
01782     /* running tracking */
01783     switch (event->type) {
01784         case ESCKEY:
01785             return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
01786             break;
01787     }
01788 
01789     return OPERATOR_PASS_THROUGH;
01790 }
01791 
01792 void CLIP_OT_solve_camera(wmOperatorType *ot)
01793 {
01794     /* identifiers */
01795     ot->name = "Solve Camera";
01796     ot->description = "Solve camera motion from tracks";
01797     ot->idname = "CLIP_OT_solve_camera";
01798 
01799     /* api callbacks */
01800     ot->exec = solve_camera_exec;
01801     ot->invoke = solve_camera_invoke;
01802     ot->modal = solve_camera_modal;
01803     ot->poll = ED_space_clip_poll;
01804 
01805     /* flags */
01806     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
01807 }
01808 
01809 /********************** clear solution operator *********************/
01810 
01811 static int clear_solution_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
01812 {
01813     SpaceClip *sc = CTX_wm_space_clip(C);
01814     MovieClip *clip = ED_space_clip(sc);
01815     MovieTracking *tracking = &clip->tracking;
01816     ListBase *tracksbase = BKE_tracking_get_tracks(&clip->tracking);
01817     MovieTrackingReconstruction *reconstruction = BKE_tracking_get_reconstruction(tracking);
01818     MovieTrackingTrack *track = tracksbase->first;
01819 
01820     while (track) {
01821         track->flag &= ~TRACK_HAS_BUNDLE;
01822 
01823         track = track->next;
01824     }
01825 
01826     if (reconstruction->cameras)
01827         MEM_freeN(reconstruction->cameras);
01828 
01829     reconstruction->cameras = NULL;
01830     reconstruction->camnr = 0;
01831 
01832     reconstruction->flag &= ~TRACKING_RECONSTRUCTED;
01833 
01834     DAG_id_tag_update(&clip->id, 0);
01835 
01836     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_MOVIECLIP|NA_EVALUATED, clip);
01837     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SPACE|ND_SPACE_VIEW3D, NULL);
01838 
01839     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01840 }
01841 
01842 void CLIP_OT_clear_solution(wmOperatorType *ot)
01843 {
01844     /* identifiers */
01845     ot->name = "Clear Solution";
01846     ot->description = "Clear all calculated data";
01847     ot->idname = "CLIP_OT_clear_solution";
01848 
01849     /* api callbacks */
01850     ot->exec = clear_solution_exec;
01851     ot->poll = ED_space_clip_poll;
01852 
01853     /* flags */
01854     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
01855 }
01856 
01857 /********************** clear track operator *********************/
01858 
01859 static int clear_track_path_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01860 {
01861     SpaceClip *sc = CTX_wm_space_clip(C);
01862     MovieClip *clip = ED_space_clip(sc);
01863     MovieTrackingTrack *track;
01864     ListBase *tracksbase = BKE_tracking_get_tracks(&clip->tracking);
01865     int action = RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "action");
01866     int clear_active = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "clear_active");
01867 
01868     if (clear_active) {
01869         track = BKE_tracking_active_track(&clip->tracking);
01870         BKE_tracking_clear_path(track, sc->user.framenr, action);
01871     }
01872     else {
01873         track = tracksbase->first;
01874         while (track) {
01875             if (TRACK_VIEW_SELECTED(sc, track))
01876                 BKE_tracking_clear_path(track, sc->user.framenr, action);
01877 
01878             track = track->next;
01879         }
01880     }
01881 
01882     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_MOVIECLIP|NA_EVALUATED, clip);
01883 
01884     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01885 }
01886 
01887 void CLIP_OT_clear_track_path(wmOperatorType *ot)
01888 {
01889     static EnumPropertyItem clear_path_actions[] = {
01890             {TRACK_CLEAR_UPTO, "UPTO", 0, "Clear up-to", "Clear path up to current frame"},
01891             {TRACK_CLEAR_REMAINED, "REMAINED", 0, "Clear remained", "Clear path at remaining frames (after current)"},
01892             {TRACK_CLEAR_ALL, "ALL", 0, "Clear all", "Clear the whole path"},
01893             {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}
01894     };
01895 
01896     /* identifiers */
01897     ot->name = "Clear Track Path";
01898     ot->description = "Clear tracks after/before current position or clear the whole track";
01899     ot->idname = "CLIP_OT_clear_track_path";
01900 
01901     /* api callbacks */
01902     ot->exec = clear_track_path_exec;
01903     ot->poll = ED_space_clip_poll;
01904 
01905     /* flags */
01906     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
01907 
01908     /* proeprties */
01909     RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "action", clear_path_actions, TRACK_CLEAR_REMAINED, "Action", "Clear action to execute");
01910     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "clear_active", 0, "Clear Active", "Clear active track only instead of all selected tracks");
01911 }
01912 
01913 /********************** disable markers operator *********************/
01914 
01915 static int disable_markers_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01916 {
01917     SpaceClip *sc = CTX_wm_space_clip(C);
01918     MovieClip *clip = ED_space_clip(sc);
01919     MovieTracking *tracking = &clip->tracking;
01920     ListBase *tracksbase = BKE_tracking_get_tracks(tracking);
01921     MovieTrackingTrack *track = tracksbase->first;
01922     int action = RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "action");
01923 
01924     while (track) {
01925         if (TRACK_VIEW_SELECTED(sc, track) && (track->flag & TRACK_LOCKED)==0) {
01926             MovieTrackingMarker *marker = BKE_tracking_ensure_marker(track, sc->user.framenr);
01927 
01928             if (action == 0)
01929                 marker->flag |= MARKER_DISABLED;
01930             else if (action == 1)
01931                 marker->flag &= ~MARKER_DISABLED;
01932             else marker->flag ^= MARKER_DISABLED;
01933         }
01934 
01935         track = track->next;
01936     }
01937 
01938     DAG_id_tag_update(&clip->id, 0);
01939 
01940     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_MOVIECLIP|NA_EVALUATED, clip);
01941 
01942     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01943 }
01944
